p: After exposed to 0.25 and 0.50 mg/mL of PHS ethanol extract for 24 h, we observed that 0.25 mg/mL of PHS significantly increased the expression levels of ctl-2, hsp-16.1 and hsp-16.2 genes, and decreased the expression levels of sod-3 and tub-1. And 0.50 mg/mL of PHS significantly increased the expression levels of hsp-16.1 gene, and decreased the expression levels of hsp-16.2, ctl-2, sod-3 and tub-1genes (Fig. 3c, d).
